packages.name: Bali Paradise Escape
packages.description: Experience the magic of Bali with this all-inclusive package featuring pristine beaches, ancient temples, and luxury accommodations.

packages.name: Swiss Alps Adventure
packages.description: Discover the breathtaking beauty of the Swiss Alps with skiing, hiking, and authentic Swiss experiences.

packages.name: Maldives Luxury Retreat
packages.description: Indulge in ultimate luxury with overwater villas, pristine beaches, and world-class diving experiences.

packages.name: Japan Cultural Journey
packages.description: Immerse yourself in Japanese culture with traditional experiences in Tokyo, Kyoto, and Osaka.
